_header: As a man may slay himself with his own knife
_description: Moral saying on the sin of lust — one couplet

Salisb103.Transcription:
As a man may sle himself with his owne knyifSo he may synne wyth his
                    owne wyif
Salisb103.Editions:
Brandeis,  Arthur,
                        ed.  
             Jacob’s Well.
EETS
         o.s. 115 (1900), repr. 1973: 161.
